author: albertdow
body:
UPDATED:
This PR concerns two modules in `RecoTauTag/HLTProducers`. They are:

`src/PFJetsTauOverlapRemoval.cc` (edited)
This has been changed to loop over the full input jet collection and push_back all cross-cleaned jets.

`src/PFJetsMaxInvMassModule.cc` (new)
`interface/PFJetsMaxInvMassModule.h` 
This module looks at a PF jet collection and finds the max invariant mass pair. No cuts are applied on mjj at this stage. An additional feature allows the user to select whether the produced jet collection contains the found max invariant dijet mass pair only or drops these from the input collection. This is for a specific case of the VBF+Taus trigger.

The three triggers that will benefit from these modules are:
`HLT_(VBF_DoubleJet115_40)_DiTau_20`
`HLT_(VBF_DoubleJet40)_DiTau_115_20`
`HLT_(VBF_DoubleJet40)+SingleJet115_DiTau_20`
seeded by VBF L1 seeds.

These are currently under development/testing. They are based on the existing `HLT_VBF_DoubleLooseChargedIsoPFTau20_Trk1_eta2p1_Reg_v` triggers and should replace them. 

The PR will therefore be required asap to finalise the trigger configs.
title: HLT VBF + Tau trigger modules for 2018
